function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Crowds and hotspots in urban areas increasing the likelihood of contagion","Impact":"Potential for a second and third wave of infections, leading to prolonged health crisis","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce crowds, regulate entry and exit hours, and identify high-risk areas for targeted interventions","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, crowd monitoring apps, public health alerts","People":"Citizens, children, young people, elderly in nursing homes","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Vulnerable groups in high-risk areas near schools and nursing homes","Impact":"Increased likelihood of contagion among vulnerable populations, leading to severe illness or fatalities","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions to protect vulnerable groups, strict hygiene protocols in high-risk areas, and prioritize vaccination for at-risk individuals","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, targeted vaccination programs, hygiene monitoring tools","People":"Children, young people, elderly in nursing homes","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions, nursing home administrators"}]}
